# Alpha Diversity Pair Tests {.tabset}

## Clustering Level
Data Clustered at the Genus level.

## Setup

### Start Conda ENV
```{r}
startCondaEnv('alphadiv')
```

### Set Knitr Options
```{r}
library(rmarkdown)
library(knitr)

opts_chunk$set(
  echo=TRUE,
  dpi=300,
  fig.width=12
  )
```

### Load Libraries

## Pair Tests

#### Initialize Table

```{r}
contrast_names = makeContrastNames(observational_variables)
```

```{r}
all_pair_stats = data.frame(
  TestGroup=character(),
  TestVariable=character(),
  Reference=character(),
  Comparison=character(),
  Observed=numeric(),
  Shannon=numeric(),
  Simpson=numeric()
  )

```


#### All
```{r}
pval_list = doPairTests(
  exp_vars = calculated_exp_vars,
  test_var = observational_variables$CaseString,
  master_table = all_master_table,
  test_group = 'All'
)

all_pair_stats %<>%
  add_row(!!!pval_list)
```

#### Age < 90
```{r}
pval_list = doPairTests(
  exp_vars = calculated_exp_vars,
  test_var = observational_variables$CaseString,
  master_table = age_lt_90_master_table,
  test_group = 'Age_lt_90'
)

all_pair_stats %<>%
  add_row(!!!pval_list)

```
``


```{r}
amd_only_pair_stats = data.frame(
  TestGroup=character(),
  TestVariable=character(),
  Reference=character(),
  Comparison=character(),
  Observed=numeric(),
  Shannon=numeric(),
  Simpson=numeric()
  )

exp_vars = calculated_exp_vars

# test_var = amd_only_variables$AREDS
master_table = amd_only_master_table
test_group = 'AMD_Only'
  
for (test_var in amd_only_variables)
{
  
  name = test_var$covariate_of_interest
  print(name)
  
  pval_list = doPairTests(
    exp_vars = exp_vars,
    test_var = test_var,
    master_table = amd_only_master_table,
    test_group = 'AMD_Only'
  )
  
  amd_only_pair_stats %<>%
    add_row(!!!pval_list)
}
```

```{r}
all_pair_stats =
  all_pair_stats %>%
  add_row(!!!amd_only_pair_stats)
```



```{r}
filename = file.path(tables_dir, 'miseq-239_alpha_div_genus_clust_mann_whitney_unadjusted.xlsx')
write.xlsx(
  all_pair_stats,
  file=filename,
  quote=F
)
```
